did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Letters from Ralph C. Davis to William Fox and a paper on Ralph C. Davis by William Fox.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of 20 pages of letters from Ralph Davis to William M. Fox, regarding management theory and the transcript of a presentation by Professor. Fox.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Management Theory Miscellany #5838m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.p: Includes letters from Davs to Fox, "Some Answers to Questions Asked by Dr. Wm. M. Fox of the University of Florida Concerning the Development of a Philosophy of Management by Ralph C. Davis," and "The Contribution of Ralph C. Davis tothe Analysis of Management Control Activity" by William M. Fox.

did.unittitle: Interview of Eric Trist by William Fox
